level.heading: Compensation; expenses.
level.text: All members shall serve without compensation, but expenses incurred by the Commission as a whole, or by its individual members, when duly authorized, will become an obligation against appropriate District government and federal funds designated for that purpose.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Oct. 29, 1975, D.C. Law 1-24, title IV, ยง 408, 22 DCR 2462.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-24
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-501.01.
